TcmtOverlayProcessor.cc

00027   /*                                                                                         */
00028   /*******************************************************************************************/
00029   TcmtOverlayProcessor::TcmtOverlayProcessor()
00030     : BaseMappingIIProcessor("TcmtOverlayProcessor")
00031     , _noiseColName("TcmtNoiseHits")
00032     , _noiseColType(0)
00033     , _mipGev(1)
00034     , _energyThreshold(0.5)
00035     , _maxDiff(0)
00036     , _maxDiffEvt(-1)
00037   {
00038     _description = "Merge processor for the TCMT";
00039     
00040     registerProcessorParameter("NoiseCollectionName", "Name of the noise collection", 
00041                                _noiseColName, _noiseColName);
00042     
00043     registerProcessorParameter("NoiseCollectionType", "Type of the noise collection", 
00044                                _noiseColType, _noiseColType);
00045     
00046     registerProcessorParameter("MipPerGeV", "MPV of raw energy deposited by a minimum ionizing particle",
00047                                _mipGev, _mipGev);
00048     
00049     registerProcessorParameter("EnergyThreshold", "energy threshold in MIP for zero suppresion",
00050                                _energyThreshold, _energyThreshold);
00051   };
00052

00058   void TcmtOverlayProcessor::init() 
00059   {
00060     streamlog_out(DEBUG) <<"*** TcmtOverlay: init() called"<< endl;
00061     printParameters();
00062     
00063     streamlog_out(DEBUG) <<"*** TcmtOverlay: calling BaseMappingII.init()..."<< endl;
00064     BaseMappingIIProcessor::init();
00065     streamlog_out(DEBUG)<<"*** TcmtOverlay: init() done!"<< endl;
00066   };

00069   /*******************************************************************************************/
00070   /*                                                                                         */
00071   /*                                                                                         */
00072   /*                                                                                         */
00073   /*******************************************************************************************/
00074   void TcmtOverlayProcessor::processEvent(LCEvent *evt) 
00075   {
00076   
00077     typedef std::map<int,float> AmplitudeMap;
00078     AmplitudeMap _mcHits, _mcHitError2;
00079     double esumMC=0;
00080     double esumNoise=0;
00081     double esumDigi=0;
00082     
00083     LCCollection* noiseVector;
00084     try 
00085       {
00086       noiseVector = evt->getCollection(_noiseColName);      
00087       streamlog_out(DEBUG) << "noise data found" << std::endl;      
00088     }
00089     catch(DataNotAvailableException &e) 
00090       {      
00091       streamlog_out(DEBUG) << "TcmtOverlayProcessor::processEvent(): no noise data available" << std::endl;      
00092       noiseVector = 0;
00093       }
00094     
00095     // process MC hits
00096     lcio::LCCollection* inVector(NULL);
00097     try 
00098       {
00099         inVector = evt->getCollection(_inputColName);
00100       }
00101     catch (DataNotAvailableException &e) 
00102       {
00103         streamlog_out(DEBUG) << "TcmtOverlayProcessor::processEvent(): no input MC collection available" << std::endl;
00104       }
00105     
00106     LCCollectionVec* _outputCol = new LCCollectionVec(LCIO::CALORIMETERHIT);
00107     // write 3d coordinates
00108     LCFlagImpl hitFlag(_outputCol->getFlag());
00109     hitFlag.setBit(LCIO::CHBIT_LONG);
00110     _outputCol->setFlag(hitFlag.getFlag());
00111 
00112     /*Angela Lucaci: change TCMT encoding also for digitized hits;
00113       hardcoded, no good, should be created somehow automatically*/
00114     EVENT::LCParameters & theParam = _outputCol->parameters();
00115     theParam.setValue(LCIO::CellIDEncoding,"M:3,S-1:3,I:9,J:9,K:6");
00116     
00117     // fill map with MC hits
00118     if(inVector) 
00119       {
00120         for (unsigned i=0; i < static_cast<unsigned>(inVector->getNumberOfElements()); i++) 
00121           {
00122             TcmtHit* hit = dynamic_cast<TcmtHit*>(inVector->getElementAt(i));
00123             if(!hit) 
00124               {
00125                 // input hits are CalorimeterHits
00126                 CalorimeterHit* aCalHit = dynamic_cast<CalorimeterHit*>(inVector->getElementAt(i));
00127                 if(aCalHit) 
00128                   {
00129                     int cellid = aCalHit->getCellID0();
00130                     float energy = aCalHit->getEnergy();
00131                     hit = new TcmtHit(cellid,energy,0,0);
00132                   }
00133               }
00134             
00135             if(hit) 
00136               {
00137                 const unsigned cellid = hit->getCellID();
00138                 float ampl = hit->getEnergyValue();
00139                 float amplError = hit->getEnergyError();
00140                 esumMC += ampl;
00141                 
00142                 streamlog_out(DEBUG) <<"TcmtOverlay: MChit: "<< cellid << " (" << std::hex << cellid << std::dec << ") "
00143                                      << ampl << " " << amplError << std::endl;
00144                 
00145                 ampl /= _mipGev;
00146                 amplError /= _mipGev;
00147                 _mcHits[cellid] += ampl;
00148                 _mcHitError2[cellid] += amplError*amplError;
00149                 
00150                 streamlog_out(DEBUG) << "TcmtOverlayProc: cellid="<< cellid <<" E=" << hit->getEnergyValue() << " -> " << ampl << std::endl; 
00151                 
00152               } 
00153             else 
00154               {
00155                 std::stringstream message;
00156                 message << "Collection " << _inputColName << " doesn't contain valid calorimeter hits" << std::endl;
00157                 throw std::runtime_error(message.str());
00158               } 
00159           }
00160       }
00161     
00162     
00163     // add noise
00164     if (noiseVector) 
00165       {
00166         streamlog_out(DEBUG) <<"# noise hits: "<< noiseVector->getNumberOfElements() << endl;
00167 
00168         for( unsigned i=0; i < static_cast<unsigned>(noiseVector->getNumberOfElements()); i++) 
00169           {
00170             unsigned cellid = 0;
00171             float ampl = 0;
00172             
00173             if(_noiseColType!=1) 
00174               {
00175                 // noise in TcmtHit format
00176                 TcmtHit* noise = dynamic_cast<TcmtHit*>(noiseVector->getElementAt(i));
00177                 if(noise) 
00178                   {
00179                     cellid = noise->getCellID();
00180                     ampl = noise->getEnergyValue();
00181                     //    amplError = noise->getEnergyError();
00182                   }
00183                 else 
00184                   {
00185                     // I don't think this will ever be processed...
00186                     std::stringstream message;
00187                     message << "Collection " << _noiseColName << " doesn't contain TcmtHits" << std::endl;
00188                     throw std::runtime_error(message.str());
00189                   }
00190               }
00191             else 
00192               {
00193                 // noise in CalorimeterHit format
00194                 CalorimeterHit* noise = dynamic_cast<CalorimeterHit*>(noiseVector->getElementAt(i));
00195                 if(noise) 
00196                   {
00197                     cellid = noise->getCellID0();
00198                     ampl = noise->getEnergy();
00199                     //    float amplError = noise->getEnergyError();
00200                   }
00201                 else 
00202                   {
00203                     // I don't think this will ever be processed...
00204                     std::stringstream message;
00205                     message << "Collection " << _noiseColName << " doesn't contain CalorimeterHits, as requested in steering file." << std::endl;
00206                     throw std::runtime_error(message.str());
00207                   }
00208               }
00209             
00210             esumNoise += ampl;
00211             
00212             streamlog_out(DEBUG) <<"added noise "<< std::hex << cellid << std::dec
00213                                  <<" E="<< _mcHits[cellid] <<" + "<< ampl
00214                                  <<" = "<< (_mcHits[cellid]+ampl) << std::endl;
00215             _mcHits[cellid] += ampl;
00216             //_mcHitError2[cellid] += amplError*amplError;
00217             _mcHitError2[cellid] += 0.0;
00218           }
00219       }
00220     
00221     // store in output collection
00222     for (AmplitudeMap::const_iterator mapIter=_mcHits.begin(); mapIter!=_mcHits.end(); mapIter++) 
00223       {    
00224         const unsigned cellid = mapIter->first;
00225         const float ampl = mapIter->second;
00226         //     const float amplError = sqrt( _mcHitError2[cellid] );
00227         
00228         esumDigi += ampl;
00229         
00230         if(ampl>_energyThreshold) 
00231           {
00232             streamlog_out(DEBUG) << " new digitized hit: cellid=" << std::hex << cellid << std::dec
00233                                  << " " << ampl << std::endl;
00234             
00235             //         TcmtHit* newHit = new TcmtHit(cellid, ampl, amplError, 0);
00236             CalorimeterHitImpl* newHit = new CalorimeterHitImpl();
00237             if(newHit) 
00238               {
00239                 newHit->setCellID0(cellid);
00240                 newHit->setEnergy(ampl);
00241                 
00242                 // FIXME: should have a class to manage this bit decoding
00243                 unsigned layer = (cellid >> 24) + 1;
00244                 unsigned stripx = (cellid >> 6) & 0x1ff;
00245                 unsigned stripy = (cellid >> 15) & 0x1ff;
00246                 unsigned strip = stripx>0 ? (stripx-1) : (stripy-1);
00247                 
00248                 // debug output
00249                 streamlog_out(DEBUG0) << "layer: " << layer << "  " << "strip: " << strip << std::endl;
00250                 
00251                 assert(layer>0 && layer<=16);
00252                 assert(strip>=0 && strip<=19);
00253                 
00254                 ThreeVector_t _myPos = _mapping.getPosition(layer-1, strip);
00255                 newHit->setPosition(_myPos.data());
00256                 
00257                 _outputCol->addElement(newHit);
00258               }
00259           }
00260       }
00261     
00262     streamlog_out(DEBUG) <<"TcmtOverlay: #hits: MC="<< inVector->getNumberOfElements()
00263                          <<" noise="<< noiseVector->getNumberOfElements()
00264                          <<" merged="<< _mcHits.size()
00265                          <<" zeroSuppressed="<< _outputCol->getNumberOfElements() << endl;
00266     
00267     
00268     // some energy accounting, to make sure that noise is being properly added
00269     double diff = fabs(esumMC+esumNoise-esumDigi);
00270     if( diff>_maxDiff ) 
00271       {
00272         _maxDiff = diff;
00273         _maxDiffEvt = evt->getEventNumber();
00274       }
00275     //   cout<<" esumMC="<< esumMC <<", esumNoise="<< esumNoise <<", esumDigi="<< esumDigi
00276     //       <<", DIFF="<< diff <<" maxDiff="<< _maxDiff <<" in evt="<< _maxDiffEvt << endl;
00277     
00278     // add new collection to the event
00279     if (_outputCol->getNumberOfElements() > 0)
00280       evt->addCollection(_outputCol, _outputColName);
00281   }
00282   
00283   /*******************************************************************************************/
00284   /*                                                                                         */
00285   /*                                                                                         */
00286   /*                                                                                         */
00287   /*******************************************************************************************/
00288   void TcmtOverlayProcessor::end() 
00289   {
00290     // some energy accounting, to make sure that noise is being properly added
00291     streamlog_out(DEBUG) <<"*** TcmtOverlay ("<< _outputColName <<"): maxDiff(esumMC+esumNoise-esumDigi) = "<< _maxDiff
00292                          <<" in event "<< _maxDiffEvt << endl;
00293   }
00294   
00295 } // end namespace CALICE
